description:
Gtk# is a Graphical User Interface Toolkit for mono and .Net. The project binds the gtk+ toolkit and assorted GNOME libraries, enabling fully native graphical Gnome application development using the Mono and .Net development frameworks.

#### Documentation
* [Features](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/gui/gtksharp/#features)
* [Screenshots](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/about-mono/showcase/screenshots/)
* [FAQ](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/faq/general/)
* [Manual](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/gui/gtksharp/)

#### Community
* [Forum](http://mono.1490590.n4.nabble.com/)
* [IRC](http://www.mono-project.com/community/help/irc/)
summary: Graphical User Interface Toolkit for mono and .Net
author: Xamarin
